name: interwar
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
happening or existing in the period between two wars, especially the First World War and the Second World War : Life was difficult for many people during the interwar years. the politics of inter-war Italy
More examplesFewer examplesThroughout the interwar years politicians tried hard to preserve peace.Housing remained an issue through the interwar period.Inter-war governments were anxious not to spend much money on roads.Many women became involved with voluntary work during the inter-war years.
